full_summary:
**Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) - Engineering Consultant Services for Intrusion Alarm System Upgrade**
================emaker=i true

**Title:**
Engineering Consultant Services for Upgrade of Intrusion Alarm System at Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Halifax and Satellite MARLANT Locations

**Reference Number:**
PW-23-01028637

**Deadline:**
Thursday, April 14, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Notice:**
This RFAP seeks to select a qualified engineering consulting firm to provide professional services for the upgrade of the Intrusion Alarm System (IAS) at 63 buildings on CFB Halifax and satellite MARLANT locations in Nova Scotia.

**Description:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites engineering consulting firms to submit abbreviated proposals for the following services:

* Assessment and investigation of the existing IAS
* Review of supporting reference documents
* Preparation of a Statement of Requirement and concept
* Design development
* Preparation of construction documents
* Assistance during the tender call and construction phases

**Security Requirements:**
The security requirements for this project are outlined in the RFAP documents.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the established criteria in the RFAP.

**Eligibility:**
This RFAP is open to all qualified engineering consulting firms interested in providing the above services.

**Submission:**
Proposals must be submitted through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the deadline.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Francis Belanger at [Francis.Belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Francis.Belanger@dcc-cdc.gc.ca).

**Notice URL:**
No URL provided.

**Contracting Entity:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC)

**Status:**
This RFAP is expired.

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Canada, specifically Nova Scotia.

**G-SIN Description:**
* Architect and Engineering Services - Buildings
* Engineering Services
